sentence.text: Over 60 years after the initial description of cellular aldehyde metabolic process, we report the first animal model for this disease: an cellular aldehyde metabolic process-null zebrafish (Danio rerio) displaying deficient lysine metabolism and spontaneous and recurrent seizures in the larval stage (10 days postfertilization).

This novel model provides valuable insights into cellular aldehyde metabolic process pathophysiology; further research may offer new opportunities for drug discovery to control seizure activity and improve neurodevelopmental outcomes for PDE
